properties.name: spring.datasource.auth.jdbc-url
properties.description: JDBC URL for the authentication db.

properties.name: spring.datasource.auth.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for authentication db.

properties.name: spring.datasource.app.jdbc-url
properties.description: JDBC URL for the app db.

properties.name: spring.datasource.app.driver-class-name
properties.description: JDBC driver class name for app db.

properties.name: google.client-ids
properties.description: List of Google client ids on authentication.
